What are the treatments for Neuroleptic Malignant Syndrome ?,"Generally, intensive care is needed. The neuroleptic or antipsychotic drug is discontinued, and the fever is treated aggressively. A muscle relaxant may be prescribed. Dopaminergic drugs, such as a dopamine agonist, have been reported to be useful.",NINDS,Neuroleptic Malignant Syndrome
